DOC.brief_summary: In parallel group study , participant randomize either 1 3 condition ( ) fruit vegetable consumption , ( b ) dietary fat add sugar , ( c ) physical activity .
DOC.detailed_description: In study , investigator evaluate feasibility preliminary result 3-month web-based lifestyle intervention 500 female cancer survivor . Specific aim 1 : determine rate recruitment , retention , attendance , satisfaction , adverse event , barrier participation propose intervention . Specific aim 2 : determine whether home-based intervention associate great improvement mean minute moderate vigorous physical activity , diet quality , body size , construct Social Cognitive Theory , health-related quality life participant randomize sedentary behavior reduction condition .
DOC.criteria: Previously diagnose breast cancer ; 1880 year old time cancer diagnosis ; EnglishSpeaking ; Have access highspeed internet . Be currently enrol another intervention study recently complete study promote healthy lifestyle behavior ( diet and/or exercise ) . Participants answer 'Yes ' one question physical activity readiness questionnaire ( PARQ ) need obtain approval physician participate intervention . Pregnant woman exclude protocol .
